item.title: Templating mermaid diagrams
item.description: Summary I would like to place lengthy strings into mermaid diagram nodes, but I don’t want to worry about escaping characters or formatting the text. I design a simple templating language based on mustache for automatically escaping text and inserting it into mermaid diagrams.
